title: Sia-Breath Me, audiophile vinyl rip, Linn Naim 45 rpm EP
description:
This was transcribed from the 45 rpm EP using a Linn Sondek LP12 powered by the Naim Armageddon supply, Naim Aro tonearm, Lyra Helikon SL cartridge and Naim Prefix K phono stage powered by a dedicated Naim Supercap. The 45 rpm speed was obtained by plugging in the turntable (and ONLY the turntable) into a PS Audio mains regenerator running at 81 Hz. The output from the Naim NAC552 preamp was sent into a Yamaha CD-recorder. 

All electronics were fed pure balanced power by a 300 lb Equitech wall mounted mains transformer. 

The bass here is DEEEEEEEEEEP and tuneful, typical of a well sorted out Linn Sondek, although having a dedicated Supercap on the Prefix was a big help. And yes, I did try powering the Prefix from one of the powered outputs of the 552 preamp-but it wasn't even close!
